item.title: Infrastructure as Code Shift Devops
item.description:
Infrastructure used to be a mess of tickets, console clicks, and “works on my machine.”
With Infrastructure as Code, that’s over.

item.title: Code Snippet
item.description:
Terraform lets you preview, deploy, and clean up infrastructure with just a few commands.
Here’s a simple end-to-end example using AWS S3.

item.title: OOP — Quick Note
item.description:
Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) — just writing this down to keep it fresh.

It’s a way of organizing code around objects and classes. Helps with keeping code readable, reusable, and more structured.

item.title: Website Launch: My Digital Home Is Live
item.description: 🚀 After years of hands-on IT experience, managing infrastructure, supporting teams, and diving deep into DevOps — I finally took time to build something for myself.
